com.hazelcast.util

Class MapUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.util.MapUtil

  • public final class MapUtil
extends Object
    Utility class for Maps

      • calculateInitialCapacity

        public static int calculateInitialCapacity(int expectedMapSize)
        Returns the initial hash map capacity needed for the expected map size. To avoid resizing the map, the initial capacity should be different than the expected size, depending on the load factor.
        Parameters:
        expectedMapSize - the expected map size
        Returns:
        the necessary initial capacity
        See Also:
        HashMap

      • isNullOrEmpty

        public static boolean isNullOrEmpty(Map map)
        Test the given map and return true if the map is null or empty.
        Parameters:
        map - the map to test
        Returns:
        true if map is null or empty, otherwise false.
